name: ZigZag Cars: Forest
description:
Tap or touch to turn the car, collect coins and try to catch all cars!

Road continues with zigzag shape and car becomes fast soon. Be careful and don't crash!

There are six different funny cars, unlock and enjoy all of them.

Challenge yourself and your friend with addictive cool action racing game.

Suitable for children and all ages. Enjoy it on iPhone, iPad and iPod touch.

Have fun !

■Game center support:
Compare your best top score with others in the world.

■Social sharing:
Share your new score and challenge with your friends circle.




All our other games:

EDUGAMES
• Fisher Cat Math - Improve your mathematical skills
• Fisher Cat Word - Improve your english vocabulary knowledge
• Fisher Cat Hiragana - Practice with japanese language hiragana alphabet
• Fisher Cat Turkish - Improve your turkish vocabulary knowledge
• Little Prince Math - Protect your castle and improve your mathematical skills
• Little Prince Capitals - While learning capitals of the world, improve your geography skills
• Little Prince Flags - While learning national flags of the world, improve your geography skills
• Math Race 3D - Car racing game with mathematics. The cars are brain powered.
• Hiragana Battle 3D - While fighting with monsters, practice japanese language hiragana alphabet
• Katakana Battle 3D - While fighting with monsters, practice japanese language katakana alphabet
• Kanji Battle 3D - While fighting with monsters, practice japanese language kanji alphabet
• Math Battle 3D - While fighting with monster, improve your mathematical skills

ICHIGO-GAMES

• Don't Wake Up The Kitty! - The kitty is sleeping and don't wake up her.
• Crossy Snowman - Free crossing game. Tap around snowman to move, collect coins and avoid obstacles!
• Color Drop! - Free endless puzzle game. Catch the drops in the correct color triangle.
• Find Hidden Alphabets! - Free hidden letters finding game. Try to find the hidden letters!
• Kitty Spacewalk - Free endless arcade game. Catch the mouse and avoid obstacles! Be careful!
• Fly Fly Rocket! - Tap around rocket to move, collect gold coins and avoid aliens!
• Find Hidden Numbers! - Free hidden object game. Try to find the hidden numbers!
• WHERE'S IT? - Free hidden object game. Try to find the hidden object in all the clutter.
• Draw Line Rush! - Connect matching colors to create a line. Pair all colors and cover entire board for solve each puzzle.
• Card Match Rush - Tap to turn cards and try to find the pairs. Match all quickly before time is up!
• Crossy Kitty - Free crossing game. Tap around kitty to move, collect coins and avoid obstacles!

• Argio Spacewalk - Help to the cute robot Argio at this addictive cool jumping game!
• Kitty Catch Mouse - Help to the kitty at this funny adventure! Be careful to angry balls!
• Gubby Rush ! - Gubbies are cute little tiny candy monsters. Pop to crush them quickly!
• Bugio Jump - Bugio is a cute robot. Addictive cool action jumping game!
• Princess Fish - The princess fish wants to go castle and help to her at this adventure.
• Escape from the Aliens - Aliens are coming from deep dark galaxy and protect your spaceship from all!
• Funny Blocks - Test your skills with free tower balance game
• Crossy Penguin - Free crossing game. Tap around penguin to move, collect coins and avoid obstacles!
• Can You Find ?? - Try to find the hidden object in all the clutter. Find it quickly for a higher bonus.
• Castle Battle - Free matching puzzle battle game. Destroy gems by creating lines of 3 or more gems of the same kind and protect your castle from enemies!

Note: This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money.
